issue.title: Support service responses beyond the service callback

content.raw: +1 for being able to delay a service response using some type of async call. There's currently no way to use a service that requires additional work to be done without blocking the whole transport thread (NodeShared threads are shared even if you spawn more than one node). It'd be great to have a send_response function that can be passed around in an async manner. After a few weeks of integration, we realized that we're blocked on this, as it's needed for our use case.
